lyrics.lyric: On the first page of our story
lyrics.tlyric: 翻开关于我们的故事的扉页

lyrics.lyric: The future seemed so bright
lyrics.tlyric: 未来看上去似乎那么光明

lyrics.lyric: Then this thing turned out so evil
lyrics.tlyric: 然而事情却变得糟糕不已

lyrics.lyric: I don't know why I'm still surprised
lyrics.tlyric: 我不明白为什么我仍旧感到惊讶

lyrics.lyric: Even angels have their wicked schemes
lyrics.tlyric: 即使天使也有邪恶的一面

lyrics.lyric: And you take that to new extremes
lyrics.tlyric: 你却将事情推到了一个新的极端

lyrics.lyric: But you'll always be my hero
lyrics.tlyric: 但是你一直是我的英雄

lyrics.lyric: Even though you've lost your mind
lyrics.tlyric: 即使你已经失去理智

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: But that's all right because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: But that's all right because I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没关系，因为我爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: I love the way you lie, oh, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 连你说谎都让我着迷，我爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: Now there's gravel in our voices
lyrics.tlyric: 此刻我们声音沙哑

lyrics.lyric: Glass is shattered from the fight
lyrics.tlyric: 争吵中玻璃碎片散落一地

lyrics.lyric: In this tug of war you'll always win
lyrics.tlyric: 你总会赢得我们的拉锯战

lyrics.lyric: Even when I'm right
lyrics.tlyric: 即使我是对的

lyrics.lyric: 'Cause you feed me fables from your hand
lyrics.tlyric: 因为你总是用不实之词搪塞我

lyrics.lyric: With violent words and empty threats
lyrics.tlyric: 带着暴力的言词和空洞的威胁

lyrics.lyric: And it's sick that all these battles
lyrics.tlyric: 令我厌恶的是所有的那些争吵

lyrics.lyric: Are what keeps me satisfied
lyrics.tlyric: 它们都让我感到满足

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: But that's all right because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: Well that's all right because I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没关系，因为我爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: I love the way you lie, oh, I love the way you lie, oh
lyrics.tlyric: 连你说谎都让我着迷，我爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: So maybe I'm a masochist
lyrics.tlyric: 也许我就是一个受虐狂

lyrics.lyric: I try to run but I don't wanna ever leave
lyrics.tlyric: 我想要逃走但是做不到

lyrics.lyric: Till the walls are goin' up
lyrics.tlyric: 直到我们之间的高墙筑起

lyrics.lyric: In smoke with all our memories
lyrics.tlyric: 我们的回忆弥漫在烟雾中

lyrics.lyric: This morning, you wake, a sun ray hits your face
lyrics.tlyric: 早上，你醒来，一缕阳光映在你的面庞

lyrics.lyric: Smeared makeup as we lay in the wake of destruction
lyrics.tlyric: 脏乱的妆容如同我们现在躺着的废墟

lyrics.lyric: Hush baby, speak softly, tell me You're awfully sorry
lyrics.tlyric: 嘘，宝贝，轻声说话，告诉我你非常抱歉

lyrics.lyric: That you pushed me into the coffee table last night
lyrics.tlyric: 因为昨晚你把我推向了咖啡桌

lyrics.lyric: So I can push you off me
lyrics.tlyric: 那么我可以把你从我身上推开

lyrics.lyric: Try and touch me so I can scream at you not to touch me
lyrics.tlyric: 试着触碰我，这样我就可以对你大叫不要碰我

lyrics.lyric: Run out the room and I'll follow you like a lost puppy
lyrics.tlyric: 然后你跑出房间，我会像迷路的小狗一样跟着你

lyrics.lyric: Baby, without you, I'm nothing, I'm so lost, hug me
lyrics.tlyric: 宝贝，没有你，我什么都不是，我很迷茫，请给我个拥抱

lyrics.lyric: Then tell me how ugly I am, but that you'll always love me
lyrics.tlyric: 然后告诉我我的丑恶，但是也请告诉我你会一直爱着我

lyrics.lyric: Then after that, shove me, in the aftermath of the
lyrics.tlyric: 在那之后，在争吵后推开我

lyrics.lyric: Destructive path that we're on, two psychopaths but we
lyrics.tlyric: 在被我们毁坏的路上，我们是两个精神病

lyrics.lyric: Know that no matter how many knives we put in each others backs
lyrics.tlyric: 但是我们知道无论我们伤害对方有多深

lyrics.lyric: That we'll have each others backs 'cause we're that lucky
lyrics.tlyric: 我们都是彼此的后盾，因为我们能在一起很幸运

lyrics.lyric: Together, we move mountains, let's not make mountains out of molehills
lyrics.tlyric: 我们可以一起创造奇迹，所以不要小题大做
remarkIdx: make a mountain out of a molehill

lyrics.lyric: You hit me twice, yeah, but who's counting?
lyrics.tlyric: 你伤害我两次，但是谁会去数呢？

lyrics.lyric: I may have hit you three times, I'm starting to lose count
lyrics.tlyric: 我可能伤害了你三次，我开始记不清楚了

lyrics.lyric: But together, we'll live forever, we found the youth fountain
lyrics.tlyric: 但是我们会永远在一起，我们已经找到不老泉

lyrics.lyric: Our love is crazy, we're nuts but I refused counseling
lyrics.tlyric: 我们爱的疯狂，我们是疯子但我绝不妥协

lyrics.lyric: This house is too huge, if you move out I'll burn all two thousand
lyrics.tlyric: 这个房子太大，如果你离我而去，我会将烧光周围两千

lyrics.lyric: Square feet of it to the ground, ain't **** you can do about it
lyrics.tlyric: 平方英尺都烧成平地，你无法阻止我

lyrics.lyric: With you I'm in my ******' mind, without you, I'm out it
lyrics.tlyric: 因为有你在才让我的理智尚存，但如果失去了你，我就会失去控制

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里看着我燃烧殆尽吧

lyrics.lyric: But that's all right because I like the way it hurts
lyrics.tlyric: 但是没关系，因为我爱这种伤害的方式

lyrics.lyric: Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
lyrics.tlyric: 就站在那里听着我哭泣吧

lyrics.lyric: But that's all right because I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 没关系，因为我爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 连你说谎都让我着迷，我爱你说谎的方式

lyrics.lyric: I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
lyrics.tlyric: 连你说谎都让我着迷，我爱你说谎的方式

lrc.lyric:

[01:32.48]In this tug of war you'll always win
[01:38.10]Even when I'm right
[01:43.99]'Cause you feed me fables from your hand
[01:50.20]With violent words and empty threats
[01:56.01]And it's sick that all these battles
[02:00.96]Are what keeps me satisfied
[02:06.73]Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
[02:11.89]But that's all right because I like the way it hurts
[02:18.70]Just gonna stand there and hear me cry

[02:29.75]I love the way you lie, oh, I love the way you lie, oh
[02:42.55]So maybe I'm a masochist
[02:48.18]I try to run but I don't wanna ever leave
[02:54.65]'Til the walls are goin' up
[02:59.79]In smoke with all our memories
[03:06.30]This morning, you wake, a sun ray hits your face
[03:08.56]Smeared makeup as we lay in the wake of destruction
[03:10.94]Hush baby, speak softly, tell me You're awfully sorry
[03:14.17]That you pushed me into the coffee table last night
[03:16.49]So I can push you off me
[03:17.99]Try and touch me so I can scream at you not to touch me
[03:20.39]Run out the room and I'll follow you like a lost puppy
[03:23.40]Baby, without you, I'm nothing, I'm so lost, hug me
[03:26.45]Then tell me how ugly I am, but that you'll always love me
[03:29.37]Then after that, shove me, in the aftermath of the
[03:32.40]Destructive path that we're on, two psychopaths but we
[03:35.25]Know that no matter how many knives we put in each others backs
[03:38.30]That we'll have each others backs 'cause we're that lucky
[03:40.97]Together, we move mountains, let's not make mountains out of molehills
[03:44.32]You hit me twice, yeah, but who's countin'?
[03:46.60]I may have hit you three times, I'm startin' to lose count
[03:49.36]But together, we'll live forever, we found the youth fountain
[03:52.47]Our love is crazy, we're nuts but I refused counselin'
[03:55.24]This house is too huge, if you move out I'll burn all two thousand
[03:58.00]Square feet of it to the ground, ain't **** you can do about it
[04:00.78]With you I'm in my ******' mind, without you, I'm out it
[04:02.86]Just gonna stand there and watch me burn
[04:07.76]But that's all right because I like the way it hurts
[04:14.14]Just gonna stand there and hear me cry
[04:19.35]But that's all right because I love the way you lie
[04:25.31]I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
[04:37.16]I love the way you lie, I love the way you lie
